snippet: Dozens of people were dead or missing, according to officials in Libya, which has become a transit point for tens of thousands of Africans headed for Europe in rickety, crowded boats.
abstract: Bodies of at least 24 migrants are recovered after boat carrying 130 people attempting to reach Europe capsizes off Libya's shore.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of people were dead or missing, according to officials in Libya, which has become a transit point for tens of thousands of Africans headed for Europe in rickety, crowded boats.

headline.main: Europe-Bound Migrants Killed When Boat Capsizes Off Libya
headline.print_headline: Europe-Bound Migrants Killed When Boat Capsizes Off Libya

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
